United States of America

AR/VR

Cultural Melting Pot

The USA is known for its cultural diversity, influenced by waves of immigration over centuries. It's a hub of innovation, entertainment, and individual freedom.

Festivals & Traditions

Major celebrations include Thanksgiving, Independence Day, and Halloween. These events are marked with parades, fireworks, and family gatherings.

Cuisine

American cuisine includes burgers, hot dogs, barbecue, and diverse dishes from different ethnic backgrounds. Each state has its own specialties.

Media & Entertainment

Hollywood is the heart of the global entertainment industry, while American music genres like jazz, rock, and hip-hop have shaped global culture.
